articles.description: Dame Helen Mirren was forced to awkwardly correct host Alison Hammond over an embarrassing royal-related error during tonight's glitzy BAFTAs ceremony.
articles.content: Helen Mirren was being honoured for her incredible portrayal of the late Queen Elizabeth II in the 2006 biographical drama The Queen - and, eager to praise the actress, Alison Hammond asserted that t… [+2229 chars]

articles.author: Charlotte McIntyre
articles.title: Richard E Grant fights back tears as BAFTAs pays tribute to late stars after wife's death - The Mirror
articles.description: BAFTAs 2023 host Richard E Grant, whose wife died in 2021, fought back tears as he paid tribute to those who had died over the past year
articles.content: Richard E Grant became emotional and struggled to hold back tears as he introduced the in memoriam section of the BAFTA ceremony to remember those in the film industry who died in the last 12 months.… [+2412 chars]
